dcterms:creator: W. Li
F. Abtahi
Z. Zhu
L. Yin
dcterms:description: The BP4D dataset includes 23 female and 18 male young adults, with both 2D and 3D videos captured while subjects show different facial expressions. AUs are labeled by watching the videos, resulting in around 140,000 images with AU labels.
dcterms:title: BP4D

dcterms:creator: K. Zhao
W.-S. Chu
F. De la Torre
J. F. Cohn
H. Zhang
dcterms:description: The DISFA dataset involves 26 human subjects who watch videos while spontaneous facial expressions are obtained. AUs are labeled with intensities from 0 to 5, resulting in more than 100,000 AU-labeled images.
dcterms:title: DISFA
